metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10852 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The UNIX pipe which sudo uses to contact SSSD and read the available sudorules from SSSD has too wide permissions, which means that anyone who cansend a message using the same raw protocol that sudo and SSSD use can readthe sudo rules available for any user. This affects versions of SSSD before1.16.3.

criterions.comment: sssd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
